task_description: 为吼巷IP形象生成背面视图（180度），保持基础造型，应用与正面视图一致的蓝白配色和装饰花纹，特别强调背部花纹设计的展示

operation_params.style_reference_description: 应用与正面视图（houthang-ip-blue-white-front-v1.png）完全一致的蓝白配色方案和装饰花纹风格。配色：主体为明亮的天蓝色，装饰有青花瓷风格的精致蓝色花纹。背面是展示花纹设计的关键区域，应呈现更丰富细腻的装饰纹样。保持3D卡通风格的圆润造型、柔和光影和细腻质感。
operation_params.additional_prompt: A 180-degree back view of the cute blue and white cartoon character. The character is facing away from the camera, showing the complete back design from head to tail. Apply the exact same blue and white color scheme as the front view: bright sky blue body with delicate blue floral patterns inspired by Chinese porcelain design. The back surface should feature prominent decorative patterns as this is a key display area. Show the back of the head, ears, and the full back body with beautiful pattern details. The character should maintain the same 3D cartoon style with smooth, rounded forms and soft lighting. Background: pure white. High quality 3D rendering with consistent color palette and enhanced pattern visibility on the back.

metadata.notes: 基于E5生成的基础造型，应用与正面视图一致的蓝白配色和花纹，生成背面180度视角，强调背部花纹展示
